Question
========

The scores on a Cito test in Arithmetic are normally distributed with mean 20 and standard deviation 5. A girl from the 8^e^ group of a elementary school scores 27 on the test. What percentage of the 8^e^ group will achieve a score higher than hers?

Answerlist
----------

* 8 percent
* 1 percent
* 16 percent

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 8 percent: Correct
* 1 percent: Incorrect
* 16 percent: Incorrect
